scripts.say: Commander... do you not have that many friends, nya?
No no, you can’t do this. Your popularity is also a part of your strength, nyaa!
Need to increase your friends! You know that right, Commander?! Build, nya~
Let {namecode:98} see your true talent when it comes to meeting new friends!
If you’re short on material, then ask {namecode:98}, nya~~ Whether its coins or wisdom cubes, you’ll get unlimited supplies!
